snippet: The credit card company was hurt by the strong dollar, although revenue rose 9 percent and net income jumped 15 percent.
lead_paragraph: The credit card company was hurt by the strong dollar, although revenue rose 9 percent and net income jumped 15 percent.

headline.seo: Slower Revenue Growth Sends MasterCard Shares Down
headline.main: Slower Revenue Growth Hurts MasterCard’s Shares
